casebody.data:
Harry SCHEELER, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
STATE of New Jersey, DEPARTMENT OF CHILDREN AND FAMILIES, and Darryl Rhone, in his capacity as Records Custodian for the Department of Children and Families, Defendants-Respondents. C-995 September Term 2017
080739 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 6, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003023-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
